00010 //******************************************************************************
00011 Real dg::Torus(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00012 {
00013         Real fX2 = fX*fX;
00014         Real fY2 = fY*fY;
00015         Real fZ2 = fZ*fZ;
00016         Real fA = fX2 + fY2 + fZ2 + (0.5 *0.5) - (0.1 * 0.1);
00017         Real fResult = fA * fA - 4.0 * (0.5 * 0.5) * ( fY2 + fZ2 );
00018         return Validate( fResult );
00019 }
00020 //******************************************************************************
00021 Real dg::Sphere(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00022 {
00023         Real fRadSqr = fX * fX + fY * fY + fZ * fZ;
00024         Real fResult = 1.0/(fRadSqr < 0.00001? 0.00001 : fRadSqr);
00025         return Validate( fResult );
00026 }
00027 //******************************************************************************
00028 Real dg::Blob(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00029 {
00030         static Real fDelta = 1.1f;
00031         Real fResult = Exp( 1.0f - Sqr(fX) - Sqr(fY + fDelta) - Sqr( fZ )) +
00032                                    Exp( 1.0f - Sqr(fX) - Sqr(fY - fDelta) - Sqr( fZ )) - 1.0f;
00033    return fResult;
00034 }
00035 //******************************************************************************
00036 Real dg::TriBlob(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00037 {
00038         Real fResult =  4.0 - Sphere(fX + 1.0, fY, fZ) -
00039                                                   Sphere( fX, fY + 1.0, fZ) -
00040                                                   Sphere(fX, fY, fZ + 1.0);
00041         return Validate( fResult );
00042 }
00043 //******************************************************************************
00044 Real dg::Heart(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00045 {
00046         Real fResult = Cub(2.0f * Sqr(fX) + Sqr(fY) + Sqr(fZ) - 1.0f) -
00047                                    (0.1f * Sqr(fX) + Sqr(fY) ) * Cub(fZ);
00048         return fResult;
00049 }
00050 //******************************************************************************
00051 Real dg::KleinBottle( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00052 {
00053         Real fResult = (Sqr(fX) + Sqr(fY) + Sqr(fZ) + 2.0f * fY - 1.0f) *
00054                                    (Sqr( Sqr(fX) + Sqr(fY) + Sqr(fZ) - 2.0f * fY - 1.0f) -
00055                                    8.0f * Sqr(fZ)) + 16.0f * fX * fZ *
00056                                    (Sqr(fX) + Sqr(fY) + Sqr(fZ) - 2.0f * fY - 1.0f);
00057 
00058         return fResult;
00059 }
00060 //******************************************************************************
00061 Real dg::TriConnect(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00062 {
00063         Real fT = Clamp(fZ, 0, 1);
00064 
00065         Real fResult =  4.0 - Sphere(fT*fX, fY, fZ) -
00066                                                   Sphere(fX, fT*fY, fZ) -
00067                                                   Sphere(fX, fY, fT*fZ);
00068         return fResult;
00069 }
00070 //******************************************************************************
00071 Real dg::QuadConnect(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00072 {
00073         Real fT = 1.0f;
00074 
00075         // use the distance of from center to
00076         // define three moving lines
00077         Real fResult = 0.0;
00078         Real fDX, fDY, fDZ;
00079         fDX = fX - 0.5f * fT;
00080         fDY = fY - 0.0f * fT;
00081         fResult += 0.5/(fDX*fDX + fDY*fDY);
00082 
00083         fDX = fX - 0.0f * fT;
00084         fDZ = fZ - 0.0f * fT;
00085         fResult += 0.75/(fDX*fDX + fDZ*fDZ);
00086 
00087         fDY = fY - 0.0f * fT;
00088         fDZ = fZ - 0.5f * fT;
00089         fResult += 1.0/(fDY*fDY + fDZ*fDZ);
00090 
00091         return fResult/100.0f;
00092 }
00093 //******************************************************************************
00094 Real dg::Ripples(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00095 {
00096         Real fT = Sine(fZ);
00097 
00098         // define a height field by using the distance
00099         // from the center into the sin and cos functions
00100         Real fHeight = 20.0*(fT + Sqrt((0.5-fX)*(0.5-fX) + (0.5-fY)*(0.5-fY)));
00101         fHeight = 1.5 + 0.1*(Sine(fHeight) + Cosine(fHeight));
00102         Real fResult = (fHeight - fZ)*50.0;
00103 
00104         return fResult;
00105 }
00106 //******************************************************************************
00107 Real dg::VoronoiBumps(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00108 {
00109         // define a height field by using voronoi noise
00110         Real fRX, fRY, fRZ;
00111         Real fHeight = VoronoiNoise( fX, fY, fZ, 1, fRX, fRY, fRZ );
00112         Real fResult = (fHeight - fZ)*10;
00113 
00114         return fResult;
00115 }
00116 //******************************************************************************
00117 Real dg::SphericalShell(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00118 {
00119         static Real fOuterRadius = 1.0;
00120         static Real fInnerRadius = 0.9;
00121         static Real fOuter = fOuterRadius * fOuterRadius;
00122         static Real fInner = fInnerRadius * fInnerRadius;
00123         static Real fDelta = fInner - fOuter;
00124         static Real fInvDelta = 1.0/fDelta;
00125 
00126         Real fRadSqr = fX * fX + fY * fY + fZ * fZ;
00127 
00128         if(fRadSqr > fOuter)
00129                 return 0.0;
00130         else if (fRadSqr < fInner)
00131                 return 1.0;
00132 
00133         return (fRadSqr - fOuter) * fInvDelta;
00134 }
00135 //******************************************************************************
00136 Real dg::SphericalFalloff(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ)
00137 {
00138         static Real fOuterRadius = 1.0;
00139         static Real fInnerRadius = 0.0;
00140         static Real fOuter = fOuterRadius * fOuterRadius;
00141         static Real fInner = fInnerRadius * fInnerRadius;
00142         static Real fDelta = fInner - fOuter;
00143         static Real fInvDelta = 1.0/fDelta;
00144 
00145         Real fRadSqr = fX * fX + fY * fY + fZ * fZ;
00146 
00147         if(fRadSqr > fOuter)
00148                 return 0.0;
00149         else if (fRadSqr < fInner)
00150                 return 1.0;
00151 
00152         return (fRadSqr - fOuter) * fInvDelta;
00153 }
00154 //******************************************************************************
00155 Real dg::EggShell( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ )
00156 {
00157         static Real fOuterRadius = 1.0;
00158         static Real fInnerRadius = 0.9;
00159         static Real fOuter = fOuterRadius * fOuterRadius;
00160         static Real fInner = fInnerRadius * fInnerRadius;
00161         static Real fDelta = fInner - fOuter;
00162         static Real fInvDelta = 1.0/fDelta;
00163 
00164         Real fE = ( 5.0 - fY / fOuter ) / 6.0;
00165         fX = fX / fE;
00166         fZ = fZ / fE;
00167         Real fRadSqr = fX * fX + fY * fY + fZ * fZ;
00168 
00169         if(fRadSqr > fOuter)
00170                 return 0.0;
00171         else if (fRadSqr < fInner)
00172                 return 1.0;
00173 
00174         return (fRadSqr - fOuter) * fInvDelta;
00175 }
00176 //******************************************************************************
00177 Real dg::EggFalloff( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ )
00178 {
00179         static Real fOuterRadius = 1.0;
00180         static Real fInnerRadius = 0.0;
00181         static Real fOuter = fOuterRadius * fOuterRadius;
00182         static Real fInner = fInnerRadius * fInnerRadius;
00183         static Real fDelta = fInner - fOuter;
00184         static Real fInvDelta = 1.0/fDelta;
00185 
00186         Real fE = ( 5.0 - fY / fOuter ) / 6.0;
00187         fX = fX / fE;
00188         fZ = fZ / fE;
00189 
00190         Real fRadSqr = fX * fX + fY * fY + fZ * fZ;
00191 
00192         if(fRadSqr > fOuter)
00193                 return 0.0;
00194         else if (fRadSqr < fInner)
00195                 return 1.0;
00196 
00197         return (fRadSqr - fOuter) * fInvDelta;
00198 }
00199 //******************************************************************************
00200 Real dg::TurbulentSpace( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ )
00201 {
00202         static Real fAmplitude = 1.0;
00203 
00204         Real fValue = 0.5 + fAmplitude * DefaultTurbulence(fX, fY, fZ);
00205 
00206         return Max(0.0, Min( 1.0, fValue ) );
00207 }
00208 //******************************************************************************
00209 Real dg::TurbulentSphere( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ )
00210 {
00211         Real fValue = SphericalFalloff( fX, fY, fZ );
00212 
00213         if(fValue > 0.0)
00214                 fValue = fValue * TurbulentSpace( fX, fY, fZ );
00215 
00216         return fValue;
00217 }
00218 //******************************************************************************
00219 Real dg::Threads( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ )
00220 {
00221         static Real fBias = 0.1;
00222         static Real fGain = 0.7;
00223 
00224         if(Abs(fY) > PI)
00225                 return 0.0;
00226 
00227         fY = fY + HALF_PI * Cosine(fX) * Cosine(fZ);
00228         if(Abs(fY) > HALF_PI)
00229                 return 0.0;
00230 
00231         Real fValue = Cosine(fY);
00232         fValue = fValue * Cosine(fZ);
00233         fValue = fValue * fValue;
00234 
00235         fValue = Bias( fValue, fBias );
00236         fValue = Gain( fValue, fGain );
00237 
00238         return fValue;
00239 }
00240 //******************************************************************************
00241 Real dg::Cloth( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ )
00242 {
00243         return Threads( fX, fY, fZ ) + Threads(fZ, -fY, fX);
00244 }
00245 //******************************************************************************
00246 Real dg::SuperEllipsoid( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ, Real fN1, Real fN2 )
00247 {
00248         static Real fRX = 1.0;
00249         static Real fRY = 1.0;
00250         static Real fRZ = 1.0;
00251 
00252         //static Real fN1 = 0.5;
00253         //static Real fN2 = 1;
00254 
00255         Real fN2N1 = fN2/fN1;
00256         Real f2N1 = 2.0/fN1;
00257         Real f2N2 = 2.0/fN2;
00258 
00259         Real fA = Pow( fX/ fRX, f2N2 );
00260         Real fB = Pow( fY/ fRY, f2N1 );
00261         Real fC = Pow( fA + fB, fN2N1 );
00262         Real fResult = fC + Pow( fZ / fRZ, f2N1 );
00263         return fResult;
00264 }
